attributes.action: Tax car on dust to dust emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rather than the short sited CO2/mile figures which the government use.
The dust to dust emission give a fairer figure for the damage a car does to the environment as it takes account the damage caused by construction and recycling. Some cars which seem to have very low emissions achieve these at very high carbon constructions costs using aluminium or a shorter life (thin metal)
